hero.title: World-Class Tutors. Expertly Vetted. Personally Matched.
hero.subtitle: At My Private Tutor Online, we offer more than just tutoring—we provide thoughtful, expert guidance at every stage of your child's academic journey.
hero.description: Our service is consultative, personal, and tailored to your family's individual needs.

steps.title: Initial Consultation
steps.description: You begin with a one-to-one conversation with our Founder Elizabeth to understand your child's academic profile, personality, and goals.
features: Subject strengths and areas for development

steps.title: Tiered Tutoring Options
steps.description: Choose the level of support that best fits your child's needs and goals with our flexible tiered system.
features: Tier 1: Official examiners - Top grades, exam strategy
Tier 2: Qualified teachers - Curriculum mastery, consistency
Tier 3: University graduates - Mentoring, subject confidence

steps.title: Expert Tutor Matching
steps.description: Elizabeth has worked alongside the majority of tutors. New educators join us almost exclusively through recommendations from trusted team members. Elizabeth interviews each tutor personally and accepts less than 10% of candidates.
features: Heads of Department at top 10 UK schools
Accredited GCSE, A Level and IB examiners

steps.title: Progress Reports & Support
steps.description: Detailed reports after every lesson with quantitative ratings and qualitative insights for meaningful progress tracking.
features: What was covered and homework assigned
Clear feedback on strengths and development areas
Automated lesson reminders 36 hours before sessions
Secure login access to all reports
